title: Quick Exit Ticket: Check for Understanding
subject: General

questions.text: How confident are you about today's lesson?
options: I understand it well and could explain it to someone else
I understand most of it but have a few questions
I understand some parts but need more practice
I am confused and need help
questions.correct_answer: I understand it well and could explain it to someone else

questions.text: Write one thing you learned in today's lesson.
questions.expected_answer: Responses will vary based on lesson content.
questions.rubric_hint: Accept any response that demonstrates engagement with the lesson topic.

questions.text: Write one question you still have about today's topic.
questions.expected_answer: Responses will vary. Look for genuine questions that show reflective thinking.
questions.rubric_hint: Accept any thoughtful question related to the lesson. If the student writes 'none,' encourage them to think of something they would like to explore further.

metadata.description: A quick 3-question exit ticket for formative assessment. Includes self-reflection and open-ended prompts suitable for any subject or grade level.
